Email 1.subject: Automatic reply: Re: [EXTERNAL] SGS Inspection requirement - Matangi

body.text:
﻿
﻿
﻿
Dear Sender, ﻿﻿
Thanks for your mail. Please note that I am on Business Travel till 14.08.2025 & hence will not be able to check emails & answer my mobile immidiately. In case of urgency, would request you to please sms me on my mobile no & will try reply as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvenience caused.
